participant_1.background:
I keep my students on their toes by keeping my lessons engaging and energetic.
i m in an education program , and hope to teach kindergarten when i graduate.
I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
i am overall happy with life.

participant_2.background:
I drink a glass of water and take a shower to wake up.
i once wrote a biography of my favorite actor.
I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.
I'm leaving the city to live closer to my family.
I start networking with other writers and joining writing groups to get inspiration and feedback on my work.

content.text: Hey there! I am doing great, thanks! How are you?
I am good, thanks! I am in an education program, and hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. What do you do?
I am a writer. I once wrote a biography of my favorite actor.
That is so cool! I love writing. I want to write a children's book one day.
That would be great! I am leaving the city to live closer to my family. I have been driving a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.
That's awesome! I am looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
That sounds like a great plan! I like to watch shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. What are your favorite shows?
I like to watch The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Brooklyn Nine-Nine. I am overall happy with life.
I love The Office! I also like Parks and Recreation. I have not seen Brooklyn Nine-Nine, but I will have to check it out. I am happy with my life too!
That's great! I am glad to hear that.
